title: Input schema of the SEC Filing Alert Scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs (EDGAR feeds)
startUrls.description: Atom/RSS feed URLs to poll. Examples: EDGAR company feed `https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=0000320193&output=atom` (Apple).

cikOrTickerList.title: CIKs or tickers (optional)
cikOrTickerList.description: Alternative: list of CIKs or tickers. When provided the Actor will build standard company Atom feed URLs for each entry (not exhaustive - used for convenience).

filingTypes.title: Filing types to alert (optional)
filingTypes.description: If provided, only filings whose type/title match one of these tokens (case-insensitive) will be emitted. Common tokens: 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, SC 13D, 13F.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max requests per crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of HTTP requests the Actor will make.

maxEntriesPerFeed.title: Max entries per feed
maxEntriesPerFeed.description: Maximum number of entries to process per feed run (newest first).

includeFullFiling.title: Include full filing text (optional)
includeFullFiling.description: If true, attempt to fetch the filing's document link (may be large). Disabled by default.

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL (optional)
webhookUrl.description: If set, the Actor will POST a JSON payload for every new filing detected.

userAgent.title: User-Agent header
userAgent.description: Custom User-Agent for requests (SEC requires a descriptive UA). Example: 'CompanyName contact@company.com'.
